text: Yadi kasaile sam'mana cahancha bhane sampurna sam'mana allahakai lagi ho. Usaitira sabai ramra pavitra vacanaharu pugdachan ra asala karmale unala'i mathi utha'umcha. Ra juna manisaharule naramra sadayantra racdachan, uniharuko nimti kathora yatana cha ra uniharuko yo sadayantra meti'era janecha
